title: Manage a Design Interface Point
description: One engineering discipline (electrical) needs to provide information (power requirements) to another discipline (mechanical) for them to complete their design.

tasks.description: Identify the interface point in the project's interface register (e.g., 'Power supply for Pump P-101').
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds the correct interface point.

tasks.description: The electrical engineer determines the power requirements and enters the data into the interface system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The electrical engineer provides the required data.

tasks.description: The system automatically notifies the mechanical engineer that the interface information is now available for them to use.
tasks.expected_outcome: The mechanical engineer receives a notification and can now complete their design for the pump.
